title: Final Mock Draft + Dameon Fierce, Super Stack - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/26
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, a mock draft ahead of a BIG draft weekend! See what draft strategies Andy, Mike, and Jason take when they are on the clock! Plus, which Defenses with a juicy opening schedule are worth targeting in fantasy football drafts? Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 26th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW

Compete in the largest fantasy football league! THE MEGALABOWL

Mock Draft Full Results
